thread.section_title: Hotel Augustin - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel near everything with great staff
thread.title_full: Nice hotel near everything with great staff - Review of Hotel Augustin - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: icktuz
title: Nice hotel near everything with great staff
text:
Stay here every time I am in Paris for business. On a quiet side street near the St Augustin Metro, with nice newly refurbished rooms and a decent breakfast. The rooms are very clean and nice but very small. I love the windows that open and the fact some rooms have a balcony. The staff are very discreet and accommodating. Last stay was 4 days in Nov 2016 and will stay again in March 2017. highly recommend this hotel for the visitor or business traveler who want a clean, nice and inexpensive room in the heart of Paris.
Room Tip: ask for a corner room, great sweeping views with the open windos. See more room tips
